timeline.message: Leverage default distributer runner's node count

Use fewer threads in tests

Tests start multiple Presto nodes together (3 by default) and tests run
in parallel (in 2 threads by default). Thus, thread usage should be more
conservative than normally.

timeline.bodyText:
Tests start multiple Presto nodes together (3 by default)

It means actually 4. 3 workers and one coordinator. How about changing the default to 2 workers?
